text: “brrda phu sraththa thanghlay! Thæcring canwn makmay cak brrda nakprachy læa bad hlwng nan kin thraphy khxng prachachn doy mi chxb læa khadkhwang(phukhn) hı xxk cak thang khx ngxallxh læa brrda phu thi sasm thxng læa ngein læa mi cay man nı thang khx ngxallxh nan cng cæng khawdi kæ phwk khea theid dwy kar lngthosʹ xan cebpwd”
